sentences.en: 2 A bad workman quarrels with his tools.
A bad workman finds much fault with his tools.
sentences.cn: 蹩脚的工匠总是埋怨自己的工具不好.

sentences.en: A bad workman quarrels with his tools.
A workman must sharpen his tools if he is to do his work well.
sentences.cn: 工欲善其事,必先利其器.

sentences.en: A workman was plucked from the roof of a burning power station by a police helicopter.
sentences.cn: 一名工人被警用直升机从着火电站的屋顶上救了出来。

sentences.en: First, it increases the " dexterity in every particular workman. "
sentences.cn: 首先, 它可以增加 “ 每个劳动者的技巧 ”.

sentences.en: In University Square workmen are building a steel fence.
sentences.cn: 在大学广场工人们正在筑一个钢栅栏。

sentences.en: Millson saw the workman, Terry, descending the ladder.
sentences.cn: 米尔森看见工人特里正从梯子上下来。

sentences.en: Only a skilled workman can splIt'slate into layers.
sentences.cn: 只有熟练的工匠才能把板岩劈成石片.

sentences.en: The cunning workman does not quarrel with his tools.
The dispute was touched off by the dismissal of a workman for insubordination.
sentences.cn: 这次争端是由解雇一名不服从命令的工人引起的.

sentences.en: The workman fixed the antenna to the roof of the house.
sentences.cn: 工人把天线固定在房顶上.

sentences.en: The workman flattened a piece of metal by hammering it.
The workman riddled the cinders ( through a sieve ) to get out the larger pieces.
sentences.cn: 工人筛 煤渣,把大块筛出来.

sentences.en: The workman was wheeling a load of bricks on a wheelbarrow.
sentences.cn: 那位工人在推一手推车砖.

words.tran_cn: 技术熟练的；精工细作的

phrases.phrase: a bad workman always blames his tools
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)自己笨，怪刀钝（或： 拙匠总怪工具差）

trans.tran_en: someone who does physical work such as building, repairing things etc
